dialogue: Indeed. It was lucky that our surveillance system picked up the missile
What do you mean by that?
It seems that this time the enemy tried to use some sort of cloaking tech to hide the missile from our sensors..
We can still access the pathfinding system right?
Yes, I believe that as long as they don't realise that we can see the missile's path, we should be alright
Have we figured out who is behind these attacks?
We are still looking. Whoever they are, they are very good at hiding..
In the mean time, I'll look into their cloaking system, to see if-
Another missile. This one targetting our surveillance system, hence the black screen. End distance has been set to {endDistance}!
It's your time to shine Agent {userName}!
